title: maravAdiru manamE
sahitya:
maravAdiru manamE orupOdum ini nI muruga nAthanadu tiru nAmam tanai


anupallavi

  tiruvEragamadil guruparanAgavE nigazhum azhagan pugazhai OdiDa


caraNam    cancalamuTru nenjam ayaravE tunjum pOdavan tuNai tanait-tEDi
tanjam avanE tAn ena nADi anjAdirundu avanaruL peravE
